data.title: Pangrams
data.statement:
Determine if a given [[text]] is a <<Pangram or not>>.

A Pangram is a sentence that uses <<all>> the letters in the English Alphabet.

If [[text]] is <<a Pangram>>, output "{{True}}".
If [[text]] is <<not a Pangram>>, output "{{False}}".
If there are <<no alphabetical letters>> in the [[text]], output "{{No Alphabetical Characters!}}".

Here is a useful link:
{{https://www.yourdictionary.com/articles/examples-pangrams}}

testCases.title: Test 1
testCases.testIn: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

testCases.title: Test 2
testCases.testIn: Brown jars prevented the mixture from freezing too quickly.

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn: How about this one? Is this sentence a Pangram?

testCases.title: Test 5
testCases.testIn: My other clash:"Characters Per Minute" gave a teaser for this clash.

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn: The crazy old woman who swallowed a fly, I don't know why she swallowed a fly... she's dead you know.

testCases.title: Test 6
testCases.testIn: The jay, pig, fox, zebra and my wolves quack!

testCases.title: Validator 6
testCases.testIn: My girl wove six dozen plaid jackets before she quit.

data.stubGenerator:
read text:string(500)

write Is this sentence a Pangram?
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> A string, which is either {{True}}, {{False}} or {{No Alphabetical Characters!}}.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Determine if a given text is a Pangram or not.

A Pangram is a sentence that uses all the letters in the English Alphabet.

If text is a Pangram, output "True".
If text is not a Pangram, output "False".
If there are no alphabetical letters in the text, output "No Alphabetical Characters!".

Here is a useful link:
https://www.yourdictionary.com/articles/examples-pangrams
Input
Line 1: A string, text, containing alpha-numeric and/or symbolic characters.
Output
Line 1: A string, which is either True, False or No Alphabetical Characters!.
Constraints
0 < (Length of text) < 250
Example
Input
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
Output
True
